channel.title: Drowning Sound Effect When Touching Water
channel.description:
Whenever I touch any body of water every 20 seconds (or so) or longer, my character makes a single drowning sound effect.
Anyone else experiencing that?

item.description:
This glitch slipped in during an update. Devs are aware.

item.title: Drowning Sound Effect When Touching Water
item.dc:creator: Aden_D_T
item.description:
I’ve been getting it alot in any water in on a rail. It happens while swimming and toutching water in general. Really really annoying and immersion breaking.

Read full topic
